mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNI.H_IDOSS_PENANGANAN_GANGGUAN (FIELD_NAME, ACTION_FIELD, CREATED_USER, CREATED_DATE, ID_NO, NEW_VALUE, OLD_VALUE) VALUES( #{field_name}, #{action_field}, #{field_name}, #{field_name}, #{field_name}, #{field_name}, #{field_name})
